entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
